E000: Fuser did not heat up. Lamp, thermal switch, thermistors, connections, AC driver, DC controller, SSR, etc.
Fuser temperature too high. Same possibilities as E000, as well as shorted wire.
Fuser temperature not rising at correct pace, same possibilities as E000.
Fuser temperature drops. Same as E000.
Fuser problem: AC driver, SSR bad, wire shorted.
Fuser cleaning web, or problem with sensor, lever or connector. Service mode 6 is the probably reset for this.
Drive problem. Main motor, gears, etc.
Waste toner drive problem, or waste toner sensor switch has been actuated too many times.
Pickup motor power supply. Could be bad motor or motor board, or DC controller.
Problem with developer unit, toner hopper, hopper motor, connection, sensor or DC controller.
Holding tray (duplex) home position sensor motor or board.
Holding tray (duplex) home sensor motor or board.
Panel locked up, but might be no code, scan motor problem.
Scan lock sensor or lock solenoid
DC controller or composite power supply problem.
RDF pickup motor or pickup sensor.
RDF belt motor or pulse sensor.
RDF feed motor or pulse sensor.
RDF tray sensor or registration sensor
Sorter main board or communication with copier
Sorter bin paper sensor automatic adjustment problem
Sorter bin paper sensor automatic adjustment problem
Auto power off circuit problem. Main switch or DC controller.
Auto power off circuit problem. Main switch or DC controller
